item.title: MLFlow 101 - Dev to Production Environment in a single notebook
item.description: MLflow is an open-source platform designed to streamline the machine learning (ML) lifecycle. It was developed by Databricks and has gained widespread adoption within the data science and machine learning communities. MLflow provides a comprehensive set of tools and libraries for managing the end-to-end process of developing, deploying, and maintaining machine learning models. Key features of MLflow include: Experiment Tracking: MLflow allows data scientists and engineers to keep track of their experiments.
